text: Don't Shoot the Messenger is an EP by Puscifer. Three of the tracks were previously released on soundtracks, "Trekka" (Sean Beavan Mix) being the only exception. "REV 22:20" was released on the Underworld soundtrack, "REV 22:20" (4:20 Mix) was released on the Saw II soundtrack and "The Undertaker" (Renholdër Mix) was released on the Underworld: Evolution soundtrack. ==Track listing== Category:Puscifer EPs Category:2007 debut EPs Category:Self-released EPs
title: Don't Shoot the Messenger
